title: Ticket not viewed after 4 days of submission.
body:
I submitted a ticket as of Wednesday and haven't gotten a response from someone yet. The ticket is pretty urgent and would hope to get some help ASAP.

Edit: If you can, please upvote this in hopes of a riot employee or someone that can help sees this easier.

replies.body:
All tickets are reviewed on a first-come-first-served basis. We've been pretty slammed with tickets lately, so response times are going to be a bit longer than normal.

I recommend sitting tight until a specialist can get to your ticket. Let me know if you have any other questions.
Knowing that, I'll sit tight! Thanks for the info!
